question: How do I reset my data?
answer: To completely reset your data and start a new budget, click start new at the top of the page.

question: Can I export my data?
answer: No, you cannot currently export your data.

question: How do I edit an expense item?
answer: To edit an expense item, simply delete the item and then enter the corrected data.

question: Does the app work offline?
answer: Yes, the app works offline on your device where you setup the budget.

question: Can I access the budget on multiple devices?
answer: No, you can only access your current budget on the device and browser you started the budget on.

question: Can I create multiple budgets to track?
answer: No, you can only create one budget at the time.
